name: Angelfire Crusader
oracle_text: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.

name: Coalition Flag
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature is a Flagbearer.
While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

rulings.text: If this card is ever on a creature you don’t control, it is put into the graveyard as a State-Based Action.

name: Coalition Honor Guard
oracle_text: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
flavor_text: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

rulings.text: Any player’s Flagbearer may be targeted. For example, if each player controls a Coalition Honor Guard, Seal of Strength’s ability may target any of them.

Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (written with “when,” “whenever,” or “at”) don’t have to target a Flagbearer.
If a spell or ability’s targets are changed, or if a copy of a spell or ability is put onto the stack and has new targets chosen, it doesn’t have to target a Flagbearer.

name: Dega Disciple
oracle_text: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There is no true equity of power. There is only more and less."

name: Dega Sanctuary
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.

rulings.text: You can gain 2 or 4 life, but never 6.

name: Degavolver
oracle_text: Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {R} as you cast this spell.)
If Degavolver was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."
If Degavolver was kicked with its {R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.

name: Diversionary Tactics
oracle_text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "It's the oldest trick in the book," said Guff. "And I ought to know—I wrote it."

name: Divine Light
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood."
—Lord Windgrace

name: Enlistment Officer
oracle_text: First strike

When Enlistment Officer enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: False Dawn
oracle_text: Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana instead add that much white mana. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: This card’s ability does not change the color of any permanents.
This card’s ability does not change any lands into Plains.

name: Gerrard Capashen
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

name: Haunted Angel
oracle_text: Flying
When Haunted Angel dies, exile Haunted Angel and each other player creates a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying.

name: Helionaut
oracle_text: Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.

name: Manacles of Decay
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.

name: Orim's Thunder
oracle_text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's converted mana cost to target creature.

name: Shield of Duty and Reason
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.
flavor_text: The duty: to defend. The reason: to survive.

name: Spectral Lynx
oracle_text: Protection from green
{B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.
flavor_text: A shadowy version of its corporeal cousin, this lynx hunts souls, not meals.

name: Standard Bearer
oracle_text: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
flavor_text: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

name: Ceta Disciple
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."

name: Ceta Sanctuary
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.

rulings.text: The ability has you draw one or two cards, but never three.

name: Cetavolver
oracle_text: Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.

name: Coastal Drake
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.

name: Evasive Action
oracle_text: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

name: Ice Cave
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)
flavor_text: Even the oppresive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.

rulings.text: The mana cost does not include cost increases or reductions.

name: Index
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

name: Jaded Response
oracle_text: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.
flavor_text:
"Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before."
—Sisay

rulings.text: It does not check colors until it resolves.

name: Jilt
oracle_text: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, it deals 2 damage to another target creature.
flavor_text:
"You're not my Hanna"
—Gerrard, to Yawgmoth

name: Living Airship
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{G}: Regenerate Living Airship.
flavor_text: The ship has a crew of three: the pilot, the gunner, and the ship itself.

name: Reef Shaman
oracle_text: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.

name: Shimmering Mirage
oracle_text: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Oh, is that all you need? Why didn't you just say so?"
—Reef shaman

name: Tidal Courier
oracle_text: When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

name: Unnatural Selection
oracle_text: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor_text: What nature makes, magic can modify.

rulings.text: You must choose a creature type that already exists in Magic.

name: Vodalian Mystic
oracle_text: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.
flavor_text:
"Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors."
—Sisay

rulings.text: It can target spells of type instant or sorcery, and not spells of other types that say they can be cast “any time you could cast” an instant or sorcery.

name: Whirlpool Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When Whirlpool Drake enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
When Whirlpool Drake dies, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

name: Whirlpool Rider
oracle_text: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
flavor_text: Where the wind meets the water, change is inevitable.

name: Whirlpool Warrior
oracle_text: When Whirlpool Warrior enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
{R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.

name: Dead Ringers
oracle_text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."

rulings.text: Both of the target creatures must be exactly the same color or combination of colors. Both being colorless is also okay. If they differ in any way, you can still cast the spell, but it does not do anything on resolution.
Colors are checked on resolution.

name: Desolation Angel
oracle_text: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.

name: Foul Presence
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."
flavor_text: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."

name: Grave Defiler
oracle_text: When Grave Defiler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grave Defiler.

name: Last Caress
oracle_text: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Draw a card.

name: Mind Extraction
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.

rulings.text: If you sacrifice a colorless creature, you get to see their hand but they discard no cards.
If you sacrifice a multicolored creature, all cards that share at least one color with the creature are discarded.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

name: Mournful Zombie
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Target player gains 1 life.
flavor_text: Treated with a powerful mix of herbs and potions, its wrappings have a remarkable preservative effect, even for the living.

name: Necra Disciple
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: "The darkness merely hides the light."

name: Necra Sanctuary
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.

rulings.text: It can make a player lose 0, 1, or 3 life, but never 4.
One permanent that is both white and green will cause the player to be affected by the lose 3 life portion.

name: Necravolver
oracle_text: Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
If Necravolver was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.
If Necravolver was kicked with its {W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Whenever Necravolver deals damage, you gain that much life."

name: Phyrexian Arena
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

name: Phyrexian Gargantua
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
flavor_text: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

name: Planar Despair
oracle_text: Domain — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

name: Quagmire Druid
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: As the druids had devoted their lives to preserving Dominaria, so did they devote their deaths.

name: Suppress
illustrator: Terese Nielsen and Thomas M. Baxa
oracle_text: Target player exiles all cards from their hand face down. At the beginning of the end step of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to their hand.

name: Urborg Uprising
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

rulings.text: You can cast Urborg Uprising with zero targets if you only want to draw a card.
If you chose at least one target and all targets are illegal on resolution, you won’t draw a card.

name: Zombie Boa
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.

name: Bloodfire Colossus
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: It deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

name: Bloodfire Dwarf
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: It deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

name: Bloodfire Infusion
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
{R}, Sacrifice enchanted creature: Bloodfire Infusion deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to each creature.

rulings.text: If this card is ever on a creature you don’t control, it is put into the graveyard as a State-Based Action.

name: Bloodfire Kavu
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: It deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor_text: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

name: Desolation Giant
oracle_text: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

name: Dwarven Landslide
oracle_text: Kicker—{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target land. If this spell was kicked, destroy another target land.

name: Dwarven Patrol
oracle_text: Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.
flavor_text: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.

rulings.text: Remember that lands are not spells.

name: Goblin Ringleader
oracle_text: Haste

When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Illuminate
oracle_text: Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you cast this spell.)

Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, it deals X damage to that creature's controller. If this spell was kicked with its {3}{U} kicker, you draw X cards.

name: Kavu Glider
oracle_text: {W}: Kavu Glider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.

name: Minotaur Tactician
oracle_text: Haste
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature.
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.

name: Raka Disciple
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The strong can also be subtle."

name: Raka Sanctuary
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage to that creature instead.

rulings.text: It can deal 1 or 3 damage, but never 4.

name: Rakavolver
oracle_text: Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} and/or {U} as you cast this spell.)
If Rakavolver was kicked with its {1}{W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Whenever Rakavolver deals damage, you gain that much life."
If Rakavolver was kicked with its {U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with flying.

name: Smash
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"They're ugly, and they're in my way."
—Tahngarth

name: Tahngarth's Glare
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

name: Tundra Kavu
oracle_text: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.
flavor_text: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

name: Wild Research
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You do not have to find an enchantment or instant card if you do not want to.

name: Ana Disciple
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough."

name: Ana Sanctuary
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

rulings.text: The creature either gets +1/+1 or +5/+5, never +6/+6.

name: Anavolver
oracle_text: Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} and/or {B} as you cast this spell.)
If Anavolver was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.
If Anavolver was kicked with its {B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."

name: Bog Gnarr
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.

name: Gaea's Balance
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice five lands.
Search your library for a land card of each basic land type and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You can find a nonbasic land card this way as long as it has a basic land type, such as Stomping Ground.
You can fail to find a land card for any or all basic land types, even if a land card with that basic land type is in your library.

name: Glade Gnarr
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

name: Kavu Howler
oracle_text: When Kavu Howler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Kavu cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Kavu Mauler
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Kavu Mauler attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kavu.
flavor_text: To the kavu, all Phyrexians are merely crunchy snacks.

name: Lay of the Land
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

name: Penumbra Bobcat
oracle_text: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, create a 2/1 black Cat creature token.
flavor_text: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

name: Penumbra Kavu
oracle_text: When Penumbra Kavu dies, create a 3/3 black Kavu creature token.
flavor_text:
"These kavu are so stubborn they even refuse to die."
—Tahngarth

name: Penumbra Wurm
oracle_text: Trample
When Penumbra Wurm dies, create a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample.

name: Savage Gorilla
oracle_text: {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.
flavor_text: These omnivorous gorillas have no qualms about a diet composed of equal parts fruit and Phyrexians.

rulings.text: You do not get to draw a card if the target is not legal on resolution.

name: Strength of Night
oracle_text: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, Zombie creatures you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Sylvan Messenger
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Symbiotic Deployment
oracle_text: Skip your draw step.
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."
—Eladamri

name: Tranquil Path
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.

name: Urborg Elf
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.
flavor_text: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.

name: Aether Mutation
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: You only put the tokens onto the battlefield if the target creature is still a legal target on resolution.

name: Captain's Maneuver
oracle_text: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to another target creature, planeswalker, or player instead.
flavor_text: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

rulings.text: If the second target is no longer on the battlefield, or if the second target is no longer a creature, player, or planeswalker when the damage would be redirected, the damage is dealt to the first target as if this spell was not cast.
If the first target is no longer on the battlefield, then the damage will not be dealt at all, so it can’t be redirected by this ability.

name: Consume Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.

name: Cromat
oracle_text: {W}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat.
{U}{R}: Cromat gains flying until end of turn.
{B}{G}: Regenerate Cromat.
{R}{W}: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{G}{U}: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.

name: Death Grasp
oracle_text: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.
flavor_text: Yawgmoth's greatest joy came from watching one hero defeat another.

name: Death Mutation
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: If the target is illegal on resolution, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. As such, you will not put any tokens onto the battlefield.

name: Ebony Treefolk
oracle_text: {B}{G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its roots are equally happy to drink the water of a clear stream or the oily blood of a Phyrexian warrior.

name: Fervent Charge
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.

name: Flowstone Charger
oracle_text: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A mane of flowstone and a mien of fury.

name: Fungal Shambler
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.

name: Gaea's Skyfolk
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.

name: Gerrard's Verdict
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.
flavor_text: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

name: Goblin Legionnaire
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: It deals 2 damage to any target.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Goblin Trenches
oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

rulings.text: The tokens are named “Goblin Soldier” and have the creature types “Goblin” and “Soldier”.

name: Guided Passage
oracle_text: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: If you have no cards of any of the specified card types, then ignore those types and the opponent only selects cards of the types you do have.
Yes, your opponents get to look at all the cards in your library.

name: Jungle Barrier
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: A massive pull of mana caused all of Dominaria to pause—Multani had transplanted Yavimaya to Urborg's edge.

name: Last Stand
oracle_text: Target opponent loses 2 life for each Swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each Forest you control. You gain 2 life for each Plains you control. Draw a card for each Island you control, then discard that many cards.

name: Lightning Angel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance, haste

name: Llanowar Dead
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor_text: Just as leaves fall from the branches of a living tree, so too do the dead leave the elfhame.

name: Martyrs' Tomb
oracle_text: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text:
Honor the brave who fought,
Honor the dead who fell,
Honor the world they saved.
—Memorial inscription

name: Minotaur Illusionist
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Minotaur Illusionist gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{R}, Sacrifice Minotaur Illusionist: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

name: Mystic Snake
oracle_text: Flash
When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.
flavor_text: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

name: Overgrown Estate
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: The decay of Crovax's ancestral home matched the state of his soul.

name: Pernicious Deed
oracle_text: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
flavor_text: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

rulings.text: If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
A token has a converted mana cost of 0 unless it is copying something else.

name: Powerstone Minefield
oracle_text: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.
flavor_text:
"We have fought this far and lost too much. We will not turn back."
—Grizzlegom

name: Prophetic Bolt
oracle_text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Putrid Warrior
oracle_text: Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one —
• Each player loses 1 life.
• Each player gains 1 life.
flavor_text: "I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get."

name: Quicksilver Dagger
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You draw a card."
flavor_text: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

rulings.text: The enchanted creature is the source of both the damage ability and the resultant damage, not Quicksilver Dagger. For example, if Quicksilver Dagger and Curiosity enchant the same creature, Curiosity’s ability will trigger when the damage is dealt.

name: Razorfin Hunter
oracle_text: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: No one knew if they'd been lurking under the sea all along, or if they'd been created by the Phyrexian overlay.

name: Soul Link
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.

rulings.text: If the creature damages itself, both abilities trigger.

name: Spiritmonger
oracle_text: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.
{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.
{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Squee's Embrace
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Squee's Revenge
oracle_text: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

name: Suffocating Blast
oracle_text: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

name: Temporal Spring
oracle_text: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.

name: Vindicate
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent.
flavor_text:
"Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."
—Gerrard

name: Yavimaya's Embrace
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

name: Fire (Fire/Ice)
oracle_text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

name: Ice (Fire/Ice)
oracle_text: Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.

name: Illusion (Illusion/Reality)
oracle_text: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Reality (Illusion/Reality)
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.

name: Life (Life/Death)
oracle_text: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

name: Death (Life/Death)
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

name: Day (Night/Day)
oracle_text: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Night (Night/Day)
oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Order (Order/Chaos)
oracle_text: Exile target attacking creature.

name: Chaos (Order/Chaos)
oracle_text: Creatures can't block this turn.

name: Brass Herald
oracle_text: As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

rulings.text: You must choose a creature type that already exists in Magic.

name: Dodecapod
oracle_text: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

name: Dragon Arch
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.

rulings.text: A multicolored card has more than one color in its mana cost.
Putting the card onto the battlefield is optional. When the ability resolves, you can choose not to.

name: Emblazoned Golem
oracle_text: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If Emblazoned Golem was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Legacy Weapon
oracle_text: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

name: Mask of Intolerance
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to that player.

name: Battlefield Forge
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

name: Caves of Koilos
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

name: Llanowar Wastes
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

name: Shivan Reef
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

name: Yavimaya Coast
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.
